00253    inline void Cell::incrementCapacity()
00254    {
00255       assert(begin_ == 0);
00256       ++atomCapacity_; 
00257    }
00258 
00259    inline void Cell::clear()
00260    {
00261       begin_  =  0;
00262       nAtom_  =  0;
00263       atomCapacity_  =  0;
00264    }
00265 
00266    inline Atom** Cell::initialize(Atom** begin)
00267    {
00268       assert(begin_ == 0);
00269       assert(nAtom_  == 0);
00270       assert(atomCapacity_  >= 0);
00271 
00272       begin_ = begin; 
00273       return (begin_ + atomCapacity_);
00274    }
00275 
00276    inline void Cell::append(Atom* atomPtr)
00277    {
00278       assert(begin_ != 0);
00279       assert(nAtom_ < atomCapacity_);
00280       begin_[nAtom_] = atomPtr;
00281       ++nAtom_;
00282    }
00283 
00284    /*
00285    * Return number of atoms in this cell.
00286    */
00287    inline int Cell::nAtom() const
00288    {  return nAtom_; }
00289 
00290    /*
00291    * Return pointer to atom i.
00292    */
00293    inline Atom* Cell::atomPtr(int i) const
00294    {
00295       assert(i < nAtom_);
00296       return begin_[i];
00297    }
00298 
00299    /*
00300    * Return number of neighboring cells. 
00301    */
00302    inline int Cell::nNeighborCell() const
00303    {
00304       assert(offsetsPtr_);  
00305       return offsetsPtr_->size(); 
00306    }
00307 
00308    /*
00309    * Pointer to neighboring cell number i. 
00310    */
00311    inline const Cell* Cell::neighborCellPtr(int i) const
00312    { 
00313       assert(offsetsPtr_);  
00314       return (this + (*offsetsPtr_)[i]); 
00315    }
00316 
00317    /*
00318    * Pointer to next cell in list.
00319    */
00320    inline const Cell* Cell::nextCellPtr() const
00321    {  return nextCellPtr_; }

00324    {  return atomCapacity_; }

00330    {  return isGhostCell_; }
